MyBug.Title: Widgets created through "desktop settings" are similar, but display different information
MyBug.Environment: Samsung galaxy S20(SM-G980F/DS), Android 12(One UI 4.1), firmware v.G980FXXUEFVDB
MyBug.Precondition: Install the app "AndroidGridTest" on your phone

STR.Str1: Touch and hold your finger on the "desktop" (Longtap)
STR.Str3: From the list of installed programs, select "AndroidGridTest"
STR.Str4: From the list of widgets in this section, select any and click "add"
STR.Str5: Repeat the procedure, create several different widgets
STR.Str6: Stretch the created widgets by length and width

MyBug.AR: Some stretched widgets show 4 cryptocurrencies, others 5 cryptocurrencies
MyBug.ER: All widgets show the same number of cryptocurrencies
